thread.title: Do You Like That Stock, or Do You Just Love its Ticker?

author: Jason Zweig
title: Do You Like That Stock, or Do You Just Love its Ticker?
text: Just about every investor wants safety, income and growth. A small real-estate investment trust — Safety, Income & Growth Inc. — claims to offer exactly that. Its ticker symbol? SAFE. Yet investing nirvana is never within easy reach, and financial labels don’t always mean exactly what they say. SAFE buys the land beneath a building   WSJ City PM: Big Banks Slide Despite Strong Earnings, What the US Can Learn from Europe on Tech Regulation
